title: mahaprabhO sri
sahitya:
mahaaprabO shree paramashivaa nin

manang kanindaruL tara vaavaa



anupallavi



tagappanoon taayuDan manaiyaaLum davapperum sOdara ruRavOrum

vigalpa vittaadiga Lagalungaal veRuppa ralladu tuNaivaruvarO



caraNam



kanmabanda jaDalam eppozhudum

kavalai nOyin paDalam



kaama mOha maadi kaLvar vaazhvanama

kazhimala niRai paaNDam



punmaiyuRum avalaneNyacam ayympula

vaadanaiyaal vEdanaikoLu maayam



boodatattuvark kaDimai poykkoorai

bOgavaazhvu pOdumpOdu maiyanE
